questions.question: A project requires 12 people to complete in 20 days. If only 8 people are available, how many days will it take to complete the project, assuming the same workload?
If all Bloops are Floops, and some Floops are Groops, which of the following statements MUST be true?
A sequence goes: 2, 5, 10, 17, ?. What is the next number in the sequence?
If a meeting starts at 2:45 PM and lasts for 1 hour and 50 minutes, what time does it end?
Which three of the following words are most similar in meaning: Analyze, Examine, Dissect, Ignore, Scrutinize, Neglect?
If a team completes 25% of a project in 10 days, how many more days are likely needed to complete the remaining 75%, assuming a consistent work rate?
All chefs wear hats.  John wears a hat.  Therefore, John is a chef. Is this logical reasoning valid?
A train travels 100 km in 2 hours.  If it maintains the same speed, how far will it travel in 5 hours?
Which word does NOT belong with the others:  Circle, Square, Triangle, Sphere, Pentagon?
If you have a team of 5 people and need to form a group of 3 for a specific task, how many different groups can you create?
